message: I'm excited to offer you this valuable product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great price for such a valuable product.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $11,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $10,500. If we can agree on that, I'm ready to buy the product.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $11,250. This is as low as I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
